channel.title: Uploaded my first (non-working) mod to get help if anyone wants to take a look!
channel.description:
https://ficsit.app/mod/AVk8zG8mNprLXw
I've missed something regarding the unlocking of the recipes. The milestone shows up in the HUB but has nothing in the 'unlock' window.
Thanks in advance
Cheers! ~GKX!
Edit: Update... Got it to show up on the menus, but my hologram doesn't show up and crashes the game if I try to build it.
Error log from when I try to build it: https://pastebin.com/Jj1xxQ6J

item.title: Uploaded my first (non-working) mod to get help if anyone wants to take a look!
item.dc:creator: @genghiskhanx Genghiskhanx
item.description:
@genghiskhanx wrote:

ficsit.app

Fast Trains (non-functional) - SMR

Adds a new Locomotive that can accelerate past 200kph

I’ve missed something regarding the unlocking of the recipes. The milestone shows up in the HUB but has nothing in the ‘unlock’ window.

Thanks in advance

Cheers!
~GKX!

Edit: Update… Got it to show up on the menus, but my hologram doesn’t show up and crashes the game if I try to build it.

Error log from when I try to build it: https://pastebin.com/Jj1xxQ6J

Read full topic
item.source: Uploaded my first (non-working) mod to get help if anyone wants to take a look!
